00007 -(NSArray *)collect:(NSArray *)views {
00008         NSMutableArray *array = [NSMutableArray array];
00009         for (UIView *view in views) {
00010                 [self collectDescendantsOnView:view inToArray:array];
00011         }
00012         return array;
00013 }
00014 
00015 -(void)collectDescendantsOnView:(UIView *)view inToArray:(NSMutableArray *)array {
00016         NSArray *subViews = ([view isKindOfClass:[UIApplication class]]) ? [view windows] : [view subviews];
00017         for (UIView * v in subViews) {
00018                 [array addObject:v];
00019         }
00020         for (UIView * v in subViews) {
00021                 [self collectDescendantsOnView:v inToArray:array];
00022         }
00023 }

00026 @end
